cast.name: 尼克.坤纳提帕.平帕拉达布 Nick Kunatip Pinpradab
萨维卡·恰雅德 Savika Chaiyadej

this_title: สงกรานต์ แสบสะท้านโลกันต์
introduction: A Thai comedy that revolves around a boxing gym that`s about to close down due to financial strains. The owner is trying his best to save it, even forcing his son to train so the son can make money as a boxer. Unfortunately, his son is more interested in music than boxing. Then the weak but determined Songkran volunteers to do it instead.
chinese_title: สงกรานต์ แสบสะท้านโลกันต์
